name: Ariel - Disney
description: My initial tests worried me because I thought it would constantly try to render her mermaid tail. I didn't train this on a single image where she has legs, only her tail. When I tried "full body" in the prompt and "mermaid" in the negative, she gained legs! Crisis averted!

modelVersions.name: V1
modelVersions.description: I didn't notice before but her face is a little brighter than her body in my prompts.
